rules.description: Pass through Cmd+Space for input source switching
Change space to left shift (Space and Shift)
Remap keys to use Dvorak-based keyboard layout

manipulators.description: Change grave (```) to number sign (`#`)
Change grave (```) with left shift to vertical bar (`|`)
Change one (`1`) to dollar (`$`)
Change one (`1`) with left_shift to tilde (`~`)
Change two (`2`) to ampersand (`&`)
Change two (`2`) with left_shift to percent (`%`)
Change three (`3`) to left bracket (`[`)
Change three (`3`) with left_shift to one (`1`)
Change four (`4`) to left brace (`{`)
Change four (`4`) with left_shift to two (`2`)
Change five (`5`) to left parenthesis (`(`)
Change (`5`) with left shift to three (`3`)
Change six (`6`) to equal (`=`)
Change six (`6`) with left shift to four (`4`)
Change seven (`7`) to asterisk (`*`)
Change seven (`7`) with left shift to five (`5`)
Change eight (`8`) to right parenthesis (`)`)
Change eight (`8`) with left shift to six (`6`)
Change nine (`9`) to right brace (`}`)
Change nine (`9`) with left shift to seven (`7`)
Change zero (`0`) to right bracket (`]`)
Change zero (`0`) with left shift to eight (`8`)
Change hyphen (`-`) to plus (`+`)
Change hyphen (`-`) with left shift to nine (`9`)

from.description: Change equal (`=`) with left shift to zero (`0`)

manipulators.description: Change q to semicolon (`;`)
Change q with left shift to colon (`:`)
Change w to comma (`,`)
Change w with left shift to less (`<`)
Change e to period (`.`)
Change e with left shift to greater (`>`)
Change r to p
Change r with left shift to P
Change t to y
Change t with left shift to Y
Change y to f
Change y with left shift to F
Change u to g
Change u with left shift to G
Change i to c
Change i with left shift to C
Change o to r
Change o with left shift to R
Change p to l
Change p with left shift to L
Change left bracket (`[`) to slash (`/`)
Change left bracket (`/`) with left shift to question (`?`)
Change right bracket (`]`) to at (`@`)
Change right bracket (`]`) with left shift to circum (`^`)
Change backslash (`\`) to backslash (`\`)
Change backslash (`\`) with left shift to grave (```)
Change a to a
Change a with left shift to A
Change s to o
Change s with left shift to O
Change d to e
Change d with left shift to E
Change f to u
Change f with left shift to U
Change g to i
Change g with left shift to I
Change h to d
Change h with left shift to D
Change j to h
Change j with left shift to H
Change k to t
Change k with left shift to t
Change l to n
Change l with left shift to N
Change semicolon (`;`) to s
Change semicolon (`;`) with left shift to S
Change quote (`'`) to hyphen (`-`)
Change quote (`'`) with left shift to under score (`_`)
Change z to quote (`'`)
Change z with left shift to double quote (`"`)
Change x to q
Change x with left shift to Q
Change c to j
Change c with left shift to J
Change v to k
Change v with left shift to K
Change b to x
Change b with left shift to X
Change n to b
Change n with left shift to B
Change m to m
Change m with left shift to M
Change comma (`,`) to w
Change comma (`,`) with left shift to W
Change period (`.`) to v
Change period (`.`) with left shift to V
Change slash (`/`) to z
Change slash (`/`) with left shift to Z
